languages.text: "Я окропил руки кровью десятков беспомощных людей, после чего годами истязал наследницу священного Патента и лгал ей, пусть и оправдывая это благими намерениями. Да, благословенная Инцендия стала образцовой слугой Империума, но путь к этому устлан множеством преступлений. Моих преступлений".

traits.locale_text: "Я окропил руки кровью десятков беспомощных людей, после чего годами истязал наследницу священного Патента и лгал ей, пусть и оправдывая это благими намерениями. Да, благословенная Инцендия стала образцовой слугой Империума, но путь к этому устлан множеством преступлений. Моих преступлений".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."
languages.original_text: "Я окропил руки кровью десятков беспомощных людей, после чего годами истязал наследницу священного Патента и лгал ей, пусть и оправдывая это благими намерениями. Да, благословенная Инцендия стала образцовой слугой Империума, но путь к этому устлан множеством преступлений. Моих преступлений".

traits.locale_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that had been paved with many crimes. My crimes."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

languages.text: “尽管我所做的一切都是出于善意，可我的双手沾满了几十位无助的男男女女的鲜血。这么多年来，我还折磨了一位神圣授状的继承人，一直在对她说谎。没错，被祝福的因森蒂娅成为了帝国的模范仆人，但在实现这个目标的道路上，我犯下了无数罪行。这些都是我的罪孽。”
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我所做的一切都是出于善意，可我的双手沾满了几十位无助的男男女女的鲜血。这么多年来，我还折磨了一位神圣许可证的继承人，一直在对她说谎。没错，被祝福的因森蒂娅成为了帝国的模范仆人，但在实现这个目标的道路上，我犯下了无数罪行。这些都是我的罪孽。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「私は無力な男女の血で手を汚してきた。更に何年もの間、神聖な令状を持つ後継者を拷問し、嘘を付き続けた。私自身はそれが正しい事だと信じていたとはいえ。期待通り、インセンディアは帝国の模範的な下僕となったが、その道には多くの罪が敷き詰められている。それは、私の罪だ」
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: 「私は無力な男女の血で手を汚してきた。更に何年もの間、神聖な令状を持つ後継者を拷問し、嘘を付き続けた。私自身はそれが正しい事だと信じていたとはいえ。期待通り、インセンディアは帝国の模範的な下僕となったが、その道には多くの罪が敷き詰められている。それは、私の罪だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Me he manchado las manos con la sangre de decenas de hombres y mujeres indefensos; durante años torturé a una heredera de una patente sagrada y le mentí, aunque con lo que yo creía que eran buenas intenciones. Sí, la bendita Incendia se convirtió en una sierva modelo del Imperium, pero en su camino hacia ello hubo muchos crímenes. Mis crímenes».
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: «Me he manchado las manos con la sangre de decenas de hombres y mujeres indefensos; durante años torturé a una heredera de una patente sagrada y le mentí, aunque con lo que yo creía que eran buenas intenciones. Sí, la bendita Incendia se convirtió en una sierva modelo del Imperium, pero en su camino hacia ello hubo muchos crímenes. Mis crímenes».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich habe meine Hände mit dem Blut unzähliger hilfloser Männer und Frauen besudelt. Dann habe ich jahrelang eine Erbin eines heiligen Handelsbriefs gefoltert und sie belogen, wenn auch mit, wie ich glaubte, guten Absichten. Ja, die gesegnete Incendia ist zu einer beispielhaften Dienerin des Imperiums geworden, doch der Pfad bis zu diesem Punkt war mit vielen Verbrechen gepflastert. Meinen Verbrechen."
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe meine Hände mit dem Blut unzähliger hilfloser Männer und Frauen besudelt. Dann habe ich jahrelang eine Erbin eines heiligen Handelsbriefs gefoltert und sie belogen, wenn auch mit, wie ich glaubte, guten Absichten. Ja, die gesegnete Incendia ist zu einer beispielhaften Dienerin des Imperiums geworden, doch der Pfad bis zu diesem Punkt war mit vielen Verbrechen gepflastert. Meinen Verbrechen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « J'ai fait couler le sang de nombreux hommes et femmes sans défense, puis j'ai torturé l'héritière d'une lettre de marque sacrée et je lui ai menti sans la moindre vergogne, tout cela en me persuadant que c'était la meilleure chose à faire. Oui, Incendia, bénie soit-elle, est devenue une fidèle servante de l'Imperium, mais cela ne rachète en rien les crimes commis pour l'amener sur cette voie. Mes crimes. »
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fait couler le sang de nombreux hommes et femmes sans défense, puis j'ai torturé l'héritière d'une lettre de marque sacrée et je lui ai menti sans la moindre vergogne, tout cela en me persuadant que c'était la meilleure chose à faire. Oui, Incendia, bénie soit-elle, est devenue une fidèle servante de l'Imperium, mais cela ne rachète en rien les crimes commis pour l'amener sur cette voie. Mes crimes. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ellerimi sayısız çaresiz erkeğin ve kadının kanıyla kirlettim, ardından yıllar boyunca kutsal Ruhsatname'nin vârislerinden birine işkence yaptım ve yalan söyledim. Bunları iyi amaçlarla yaptığıma inansam da yaptım. Kutsanmış İncendia, İmparatorluk'un örnek bir hizmetkârı oldu çıktı ancak bu noktaya açılan yol, sayısız suçla döşendi. Benim suçlarımla."
languages.original_text: "I have tainted my hands with the blood of scores of helpless men and women; then, for years, I tortured an heir to a sacred Warrant and lied to her, albeit with what I believed were good intentions. Yes, the blessed Incendia became a model servant of the Imperium, but the path toward that was paved with many crimes. My crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Ellerimi, sayısız çaresiz erkeğin ve kadının kanıyla kirlettim, ardından yıllar boyunca kutsal Ruhsatname'nin vârislerinden birine işkence yaptım ve yalan söyledim. Her ne kadar bunları iyi amaçlarla yaptığıma inansam da. Evet, kutsanmış İncendia, İmparatorluk için örnek bir hizmetkâr haline geldi ancak bu noktaya açılan yol, sayısız suçla döşendi. Benim suçlarımla."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
